fields.name: AvailabilityZone
fields.description: The zone name used for this rack when created. Availability zones are used for workload placement.

fields.name: BareMetalMachineConfigurationData
fields.description: The unordered list of bare metal machine configuration.

fields.name: NetworkRackId
fields.description: The resource ID of the network rack that matches this rack definition.

fields.name: RackLocation
fields.description: The free-form description of the rack's location.

fields.name: RackSerialNumber
fields.description: The unique identifier for the rack within Network Cloud cluster. An alternate unique alphanumeric value other than a serial number may be provided if desired.

fields.name: RackSkuId
fields.description: The resource ID of the sku for the rack being added.

fields.name: StorageApplianceConfigurationData
fields.description: The list of storage appliance configuration data for this rack.
